description: This delightful restaurant on the 10th floor of the Grand Hotel Bristol occupies a roof garden with breathtaking views of the promontory of Portofino. Dishes from all over Italy feature on the menu, with a particular emphasis given to regional specialities. Make sure you try the tortelli di Preboggion (pasta with local herbs) served with a Vaise cheese and walnut sauce.
